message.lockbox.break: You cannot break this block; it is inside a Lockbox
message.lockbox.place: You cannot place a block here; it would be inside a Lockbox
message.lockbox.use: You cannot use this; it is inside a Lockbox
message.lockbox.toobig: This lockbox is too big! The max size allowed is %1$s blocks per side.
message.lockbox.toosmall: This lockbox has no interior. Make it bigger!
message.lockbox.incomplete_frame: This lockbox's frame is missing pieces.
